summary: This is an email forwarded by Mark Luster on September 22, 2021, containing a message from Mark Epstein to Stacey Richman. The subject line references 'JES' and the body lists physical injuries including a blood vessel in the eye like strangulation, bruises to the mouth, and a bruise to the back of the neck.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding injuries
events.description: Mark Epstein sent an email to Stacey Richman describing injuries including a blood vessel in the eye like strangulation, bruises to the mouth, and a bruise to the back of the neck. Mark Luster forwarded this email.

keyFacts: An email dated September 22, 2021, from Mark Epstein to Stacey Richman describes physical injuries including a blood vessel in the eye resembling strangulation.
The email also notes bruises to the mouth and a bruise to the back of the neck.
The email was forwarded by Mark Luster, indicating potential legal or investigative interest in its contents.
